snippet: The war photographer Robert Capa, best known for his stark black-and-white images, also worked with color film, as “Capa in Color” at the International Center of Photography shows.
abstract: Martha Schwendener reviews exhibit Capa in Color, featuring color pictures taken by war photographer Robert Capa, at International Center of Photography.
lead_paragraph: The war photographer Robert Capa, best known for his stark black-and-white images, also worked with color film, as “Capa in Color” at the International Center of Photography shows.

headline.seo: ‘Capa in Color’ at International Center of Photography
